description:
Ryouun and Sonshin are fleeing to the Southern Palace, pursued by another of Hakuanshin`s generals.  On their way, they are trapped in a labyrinthine neighborhood, and led into an ambush by a group of neighborhood thugs. But the head thug is tougher than the others, and he`s strong enough to even fight Ryouun`s general!
Source: crunchyroll
